references.paper_title: Mastering the game of Go with deep neural networks and tree search
references.reason: This paper is foundational for deep reinforcement learning and demonstrates the power of combining deep neural networks with reinforcement learning algorithms to achieve superhuman performance in complex games.

references.paper_title: Human-level control through deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This work introduced deep Q-networks (DQN), a significant breakthrough for using deep learning in reinforcement learning, making it possible to solve complex tasks previously unachievable.

references.paper_title: Addressing function approximation error in actor-critic methods
references.reason: This paper introduced TD3, which effectively addresses function approximation errors, a significant challenge in actor-critic methods that has improved the performance of many continuous control reinforcement learning algorithms.

references.paper_title: A distributional perspective on reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper proposed distributional reinforcement learning, which offers a more nuanced perspective on learning value functions than traditional methods, resulting in more stable learning and improved performance.
This paper provides a comprehensive overview of reinforcement learning, establishing foundational concepts and summarizing key methods of this field.
